channel.title: Comments for page "The Flash"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Flash"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Except if Grog was there, it would be easy to find out. Because the +5% chance to find items would show up after the second time you did the mission, and the mission doesn't have any other items you can find there.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Ichi Special Ramen can help, as well as the Epic Dog Urination Technique or Diagnosis jutsu. Then again, that tip goes for pretty much any item you want to find. It's there, just keep at it. And remember, every time you fail at finding an item/event/ally/ally level-up, the chances go up by 5% (or 50% if it was a megamission)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: i doubt this much, since the RNG can be rather evil. chances are your just having a hard time finding it.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
page needs to be updated.

"You can find Grog on the D-Rank Mission Feed the Scouts."

this is no longer true
